content:
I am not getting email notifications from Jira for issues that I am watching, ones that I created.
I used to get them with GForge.
What do I need to change?
Good morning Richard, it seems that there is an email mismatch between Jira and the one in this stream. Can you PM me the correct email that should be in Jira please? We can verify and go from there
@Joshua Procious I am having the same issue. I have not received any notifications in months-- probably since the change over to Jira.
@Paul Lynch can you PM your correct email so I can verify against Jira please?
